sub_title: I help create high-performing teams, letting you, the founder, focus on growing the business | Executive Coach
summary:
WHAT I DO: I help senior business leaders struggling with team performance, collaboration, and conflict to create high-performing teams that consistently meet company goals. Teams learn to communicate, collaborate, and manage conflict.

Clients reach out to me during several instances, such as a company reorganization or restructuring, a new leader taking a post (you or someone else), conflict cannot be managed internally, or team performance/organization is struggling.

Behavioral science, documented research, proven methods, and group psychology are at the root of my approach. My three-pronged approach includes:

𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 the current situation to understand the dynamics, challenges, strengths, weaknesses, and developmental needs of the company using interviews, evaluations, questionnaires, and benchmarking.

𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 participants, getting them motivated and engaged through bespoke interventions, creating the need to step up.

𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 teams for lasting improvements by providing a psychologically safe environment for them to try new things, make mistakes and develop; helping individuals and the team gain new perspectives and internalize improvements; helping them when they inevitably get stuck, and sustainably achieving results.

WHAT MAKES ME UNIQUE:
➤ First-hand experience improving team performance by leading both high-performing and non-performing teams. I recognize the need for fast improvements while maintaining the efficiency of everyday operations.

➤ I use behavioral science to transform a team into a long-lasting, effective group. Science proves that skill is no guarantee for success. I have watched teams with intelligent, highly skilled people fail and teams with less skilled people soar to success.

➤ The design of my interventions is unique, combining high-energy experiential workshops and coaching, challenging the participants, and supporting teams as they return to their everyday work lives. Follow-up coaching ensures that the team maintains momentum and is critical to sustaining results over time.


PAST CLIENTS INCLUDE: 
• AkzoNobel
• Exxon
• General Electric
• Accenture
• CapGemini
• DAF Trucks (Paccar)
• Oce (Canon)
• Xerox
• Syngenta
• BASF
• Nashuatec
• ASML
• The Center for Creative Leadership
• Aptean
• Jet Aviation
• Vion Food Group
• Marquard & Bahls

CONTACT: Email hello@topteam.academy or call +31 6 348 78 179

profile_positions.description:
With a combined experience of over 40 years, we have made it our mission to help organisations, teams and individuals to successfully implement lasting change. We deeply believe that lasting change can only be driven from within and needs to address both the content and the psychology of change. 

We help executive teams find clarity and focus, harnessing the potential of the organisation, finding the best of what lies within and expanding these practices throughout the organisation. We support leaders to be the best they can be to lead their teams and the organisation to greater performance and a productive, purposeful culture.
Our clients own and develop their strategy, culture and implementation. We support by providing facilitation, frameworks, process and coaching. We challenge assumptions and stimulate with new ideas and insights. We develop and transfer skills, capabilities and key processes into the business. And we passionately believe our clients’ great aspirations are achievable.
profile_positions.title: Partner| High Performing Team Architect

profile_positions.description:
When you can harness all the talent in your workforce, create buy-in for a shared vision and embed it in the right culture, you unlock your organisation's full potential, making growth inevitable.
 
My entire career has revolved around helping organisations implement large-scale projects, achieve workforce buy-in and fix broken cultures and dysfunctional teams.
 
As a change agent, I excel at resetting an organisation's direction and introducing game-changing organisational improvements.
 
I have a proven track record for:
 
~ Successfully guiding organisations through complex change initiatives/projects
~ Removing the roadblocks and fixing the potholes preventing a change initiative/project from gaining traction 
~ Fixing broken cultures and repairing relationships and communication pathways for teams and organisations that have lost their way
~ Taking on the mantle of the impartial, mission-focused change agent in organisations where it is impossible for internal employees to do so because of political/career considerations.
 
I have enjoyed great success strengthening companies’ positions on a global scale by successfully executing key programs and business transformations with significant results. 
 
As an example, I was involved in re-establishing relations between European and American eBusiness Organisations for a high-tech equipment manufacturer. Further, as an eBusiness Director Europe, I helped lower the cost of European eBusiness operations and programs by 75% and roll out a new common portal to nine European countries over 18 months.

With my help, my clients saw significant increases in productivity and effectiveness as well as reductions in expenses and redundancies. These companies include: Exxon Chemical, General Electric, Accenture, Capgemini, Oce (Canon), Xerox, BASF, ASML, AkzoNobel, Center for Creative Leadership, Royal Dutch Mail, Syngenta, EDSN, FBTO, Amgen, Ricoh and Alcatel-Lucent.
profile_positions.title: Partner | Change Agent

profile_positions.description:
- Expertly guided organisational transformation by delivering a new IT strategy and restructuring the organisation and key processes accordingly.
- By successfully defining and implementing key IT management processes including Architecture Governance, Project and Change Management, Quality & Compliance Assurance, and Budget Monitoring & Controlling.
- Actively participated as a voting member of the ASML Compliance Committee to improve IT Compliance.
- Fostered accurate and timely management information as well as restructuring and improving PMO teams across the organisation.
profile_positions.title: Director CIO Office (Interim from the Strategy Execution Group)

profile_positions.description:
- Bolstered productivity 35% for the 16-member operations team and improved the operating margin by more than 20% across programs, projects, and IT activities in the EMEA region by implementing a new operating model.
- Achieved outstanding client satisfaction, designing and delivering multiple leadership development programs to clients, including industry leaders such as Nestlé, Philips, Ingersoll Rand, and Qtel.
- Collaborated effectively with team members to manage, co-design, and co-deliver programs.
- Awarded by ASTD for the design of a women leadership development program.
profile_positions.title: Director of Operations (Interim from the Strategy Execution Group)

profile_positions.description:
- Handling the general management and P&L of a Consulting Services business unit before recruiting a successor.
- Designing and implementing a training curriculum for the consultants and adopting a quality management and assurance approach.
- Implementing HR structure to bring consistency in career tracks, remuneration, training, recruiting, etc.
- Improved bottom line results by just over 50% and recovered the full restructuring cost within the budget year after overhauling the organisation and implementing a new business and operating model.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager (Interim from the Strategy Execution Group)

profile_positions.description:
- Recruited, hired, trained, and mentored a team of 16 consultants and initiated a skill and knowledge improvement program in setting up and leading a Commercial Strategy and Execution consulting practice.
- Steadily grew business 15% by acquiring, managing, and delivering and overseeing multiple projects in the field focused on Market Positioning, Go-to-Market approach, Segmentation, and Business and Operating model design.
- Received a regional internal performance award for the most successful client intervention that year.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Customer Strategy

profile_positions.description:
- Raised overall sales performance 10% and improved sales management via the new go-to-market approach and operating model for Consulting Services Netherlands.
- Personally oversaw approximately €3M in revenue as Client Executive for the key account, building and managing a consulting practice focused on Sales & Distribution Management.
- Facilitated smart growth, building a team of 12 consultants from scratch and acquiring and executing consulting projects in the Products market segment totaling approximately €15M.
- Accomplished client satisfaction above target client satisfaction and financial performance.
profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant CRM

profile_positions.description:
~ Oversaw 35 full-time employees for an Information Logistics professional services organisation, providing consulting services, designing and delivering training programs, publications (a leading industry magazine and book series), organizing seminars and conducting research.
~ Turned around an underperforming organisation in a short time, generating a positive operational result by the end of Q2 2005 and bringing it back to profit by Q3 2005.
~ Boosted client satisfaction and reduced client churn 30% by defining and implementing a professional skill improvement (training) program.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
~ Grew a world-class team from the ground up, expanding from 0 to 39 consultants and pioneering a consulting practice in the area of Marketing, Sales, and Service for the Electronic & High-Tech market. 
~ Directed day-to-day functions with a focus on CRM Strategy & Implementation and managed various CRM-related projects in Europe and the USA. 
~ Achieved consistently outstanding results by taking a hands-on approach to leadership, delivering all projects on time, within budget, and to or above client expectation. 
~ Successfully administrated project budgets from €500K to €15M and led project teams ranging in size from 5 to 150.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager
